title: Wrapper class for the PMX mutate (https://github.com/dseeliger/pmx/wiki) module.

input_structure_path.description: Path to the input structure file.

output_structure_path.description: Path to the output structure file.

input_b_structure_path.description: Path to the mutated input structure file.

mutation_list.description: separated by commas. If no chain is provided as chain code all the chains in the pdb file will be mutated. ie: "A:ALA15CYS"

resinfo.description: Print a 3 to 1 letter residue list.

dna.description: Generate hybrid residue for the DNA nucleotides.

rna.description: Generate hybrid residue for the RNA nucleotides.

pmx_cli_path.description: Path to the PMX Python2.7 client.

restart.description: [WF property] Do not execute if output files exist.

container_path.description: Path to the binary executable of your container.

container_volume_path.description: Path to an internal directory in the container.

container_working_dir.description: Path to the internal CWD in the container.

container_user_id.description: User number id to be mapped inside the container.

container_shell_path.description: Path to the binary executable of the container shell.
